option.maseffects.shockwave_tooltip: Creates a shockwave effect when slamming with the Mace
option.maseffects.spark_tooltip: Creates metal sparks when slamming with the mace
option.maseffects.flash_tooltip: Creates a flash effect when slamming with the mace
option.maseffects.armor_tooltip: Creates an armor breaking effect when using breach
option.maseffects.totem_tooltip: Replaces totem particles with custom ones
option.maseffects.mace_shield_tooltip: Shielding a Mace attack will create a shockwave
